common.coreFeaturesDesc: StreamPark 让您的流处理作业更简单的核心特性

slogan.description: 流处理极速开发框架，流批一体 & 湖仓一体的云原生平台，一站式流处理计算平台

feature.title: 简单易用
feature.details: 提供了一系列快捷 API 和 Connector，开箱即用，作业状态自动追踪, 分钟内即可完成作业的开发和管理

feature.title: 流批一体
feature.details: StreamPark 同时支持 Apache Flink & Apache Spark，无缝支持流式处理和批处理，连接互通，创造更多可能

feature.title: 一站式解决方案
feature.details: StreamPark 为流处理作业提供全生命周期支持，从开发到部署，集等众多功能于一身，是一站式流处理平台

development.title: 编写代码
development.description: 使用 StreamPark API 快速进行作业开发

development.title: 调试代码
development.description: 传入 StreamPark 约定的配置，进行本地作业调试

development.title: 部署任务
development.description: 使用 StreamPark 来部署和管理您的作业

honor.description: 我们获得了些殊荣，这些荣誉属于所有为 StreamPark 做出贡献的人，感谢您的付出！

common.coreFeaturesDesc: The key features of StreamPark is to make your stream processing easier.

slogan.description: Make stream processing easier! Easy-to-use streaming application development framework and operation platform, with Apache Flink and Apache Spark supported.

feature.title: Easy to use
feature.details: Only one service, easy deployment. Automatic job status tracking, enabling development and management of jobs within minutes.

feature.title: Unified Batch & Streaming
feature.details: StreamPark supports both Apache Flink and Apache Spark, making it easier to seamlessly support streaming and batch processing

feature.title: One-stop Solution
feature.details: StreamPark provides full lifecycle support for stream processing jobs.from development to deployment, It is an one-stop streaming platform

development.title: Write
development.description: Develop your code quickly using the StreamPark API

development.title: Debug
development.description: Debug your code with the standardized configuration

development.title: Deploy
development.description: Deploy and manage your jobs using StreamPark

honor.description: We have received some precious honors, which belong to everyone who contributes to StreamPark, Thanks
